title: cryptonite1080
author: cryptonite1080
content: What advice do you have for newcomers diving into the world of crypto gambling? Any lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Gambling is not any means of making money. This is where the addiction start. Gambling is fun, if you can continue to gamble responsibly.Have a gambling budget and do not let it be more than 5% of your weekly incomeControl your emotion. If you lose for the day, stop gambling. Do not be tempted.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: Quote from: cryptonite1080 on November 06, 2023, 01:10:00 PMWhat advice do you have for newcomers diving into the world of crypto gambling? Any lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?The key advise any new gambler must take is that gambling is not supposed to be done when you have not figured out how to survive without the money you invested in or targeted to win. You should only gamble when you have a job or another means of generating income. Let gambling just be another stream of income that should be done with a little fraction of your money such that you can afford to loose it. Secondly, whenever you have a good win, withdraw the money and use it immediately in something very important that you can remember and appreciate. Don't keep gambling and hoping to win more whenever you have had a major win. Don't give back the money to you win, it is not the right thing. Finally,  treat gambling as a game of probability because nothing is sure. Don't be greedy and don't be desperate.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: cryptonite1080 on November 06, 2023, 01:10:00 PMWhat advice do you have for newcomers diving into the world of crypto gambling? Any lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?Simply deposit only what you can afford to lose. Bet only small percentage of your bankroll and never increase your bet to an insane percentage whenever you are experiencing lose streak because you can still recover if you will just play the same and stay focus since the game has only minimal house edge.Just make sure you are still enjoying while playing or else just stop gambling because the purpose of gambling to make you entertained by the time you play. Profit will just follow if you are consistent on your game and doesn’t subject to any abnormal increase of bet when tilted.

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Evaluate yourself with a professional to determine if you are prone to being addicted to gambling or any other activity, those are the best first dollars you should spend, the best first bet you can make.If you are going to be a recreational or frequent player, decide well before you start placing bets.Finally, do not believe in that fallacy of 5% of your income to play, you should not take any amount of your budget to burn in the game, use extra money, get an alternative source of income.Choose carefully which games your skills are best in, and always stay informed, there is a lot of documentation that you should read.

comments.author: junder

Profit will just follow if you are consistent on your game and doesn’t subject to any abnormal increase of bet when tilted.That's the first step that every gambler should pay attention to, especially for those who are new to the world of gambling, always about setting the amount of budget that you can be responsible for whatever the final result is, I understand that there are opportunities in gambling but what is certain and what has been proven is that usually the final result is more often losing than winning, so that's why as we know now more and more people are suffering from large amounts of loss, none other than that because they are too serious and bring the wrong mindset to gambling. Gambling is nothing more than a fun activity, so don't be fooled by the name of opportunity, because on the other hand there is no guarantee and certainty for you to win.So yes of course the amount of budget that is not excessive will have an important role as one of the precautions, because I'm not sure you can accept if the final result loses when carrying a large amount of budget that you cannot afford. Right, make sure we will stay awake in each of our gambling sessions, after all this is just an activity that relies on luck alone no more than that.

comments.author: Hatchy
comments.body: Quote from: cryptonite1080 on November 06, 2023, 01:10:00 PMWhat advice do you have for newcomers diving into the world of crypto gambling? Any lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?As a beginner in gambling, it's important to remember that it's meant for enjoyment, not as a way to make a living. If you start thinking of it as your survival, you might end up among those who struggle with addiction. This could lead you to borrow money for gambling, not set limits, and get too emotional while playing. Being a responsible gambler means keeping control to prevent becoming addicted.

Any lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?It doesn't have to be the ones learnt the hard way, we don't have to scare the newbies with our touchy stories in other not to let them loose interest, newbies should know that gambling should be enjoyed as a means of having fun, getting entertained and being lifted from heep of loads of stress, we should also consider that risk involved, we should gamble with the money we can afford loosing to gamble, we should not borrow money, we should gamble responsibly and avoid being addicted, being a gambler is not an avenue of being irresponsible.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: cryptonite1080 on November 06, 2023, 01:10:00 PMWhat advice do you have for newcomers diving into the world of crypto gambling?Ask yourself first why you need to gamble, what is your motivation and your mindset, is it to make money, is it for entertainment, do you have a strong character that will not lead you to go astray and become addicted to gambling, be honest without yourself if you are ready then don't allocate more than you can afford to lose and just enjoy.QuoteAny lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?For me chasing losses, I should have stopped and been contented when I already won a good amount, but I kept going thinking that I could recover all my past losses and that's the biggest mistake I've made, one of the hardest things a gambler faced is how and when to stop they keep going until they get burned or lose everything.Be sure to take things easy and remember all you've learned and read when faced when a tough decision, the bottom line is always enjoy the game, you're a winner if you log out feeling satisfied.

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: What are you looking for in the world of gambling? If you want to make money, gambling is not an effective place to make money. When you are addicted to gambling, it will be very difficult to control yourself from visiting gambling places. If you want to have fun, you will not be approached by what is called addiction because you can control yourself when gambling or become a responsible gambler. I mean, you only spend the money that has been provided to spend when you want to play.Always control your emotions when gambling, if you lose control when gambling, you will forget all your original goals when you started gambling.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: cryptonite1080 on November 06, 2023, 01:10:00 PM Any lessons you learned the hard way that you'd like to share?Avoid playing games that you are not familiar and always check the currency you are using before you place a bet because some casino automatically convert your balance to USD and some casino let you use your original deposit currency to place bet. This is dangerous because you might thinking betting in USD but in reality your currency is set to mbtc or other currency that has high value than USD.  I learn this the hard way when I’m new on slot game although I rarely saw a casino that doesn’t use standard USD currency on in game bet.Lastly, Play only on reputable casino and avoid using unknown casino just because they offer too good to be true bonuses because it will be a painful loss once they halt your withdrawal when you won. Just stick to trusted brand.
